Request.RequestTemplate: <DataSet Name="CreatePADataSet" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <Attributes> <Attribute Name="Label" Type="System.String" Value="CreatePA;{24};SPA"/> </Columns> <Rows> <Row REQUEST_ID="reversecut({21},4)-{25}" PERSONAL_ACCOUNT_ID="{0}" BALANCE="{1}" CURRENCY_CODE="{2}" PA_BALANCE_STATUS="{3}" PA_STATUS="{4}" {5} BLOCK_LIMIT="{6}"
